title: Man charged with child molesting
content:
A 28-year-old Frankfort man has been formally charged with one count of child molestation. 
The prosecutor's office is alleging that Rodrigo Castillo Trudillo molested a 10-year-old child on a few occasions earlier in the year. 

Trudillo pleaded not guilty Wednesday to the accusation. 

Officers arrested Trudillo after the Division of Family and Children Services reported a case of sexual abuse, according to a probable cause affidavit. 

While at the victim's home, Trudillo allegedly abused the child while she slept, according to court documents. 

During a police interview, Trudillo allegedly admitted to touching the victim once three months ago. The probable cause affidavit notes that Trudillo was remorseful about his actions and that he said he was drunk when it happened. 

Trudillo said he would hire his own attorney, and his trial is set for Dec. 22. After the hearing, he was remanded back to the Clinton County Jail.
